name: corner-to-corner throw
notes:
skill level: intermediate



fun to stitch afghan blends texture and color to create this pretty crochet accent for your home.

red heart® “super saver®”: 4 skeins 316 soft white ca, 5 skeins 885 delft blue cb, 7 skeins 310 monet print cc.
crochet hook: 5 mm [us h-8].

gauge: 6 blocks = 4"; 6 rows = 4" in pattern

[corner to corner crochet throw](/patterns/library/corner-to-corner-crochet-throw) is a newer version revised by bobbi anderson is smaller, uses 4 colors and a different size hook.
